title: Discover Commerce-as-a-Service at Shop.org: Learn Ways to Accelerate your eCommerce Business across Every Channel
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/1/2015 @ 10:55 AM Companies mentioned in this article: commercetools 
NEW YORK, Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- commercetools , a cloud commerce software provider, will showcase its Commerce-as-a-Service (CaaS) platform, a cloud based delivery architecture helping retailers drive omni-channel eCommerce, at the 2015 Shop.org Digital Summit (booth # 1068) from October 5-7, 2015. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151001/273081LOGO 
"Commerce is evolving and businesses need new ways to interact with customers across all channels," said Arthur Lawida, president, commercetools. "commercetools is at the center of the transformation by helping businesses breakaway from the overly complex, restrictive and costly architecture that leads to frustration and drastically slows innovation. We look forward to sharing how Commerce-as-a-Service sparks innovation and creativity while enhancing revenue across all channels at Shop.org." 
Learn about the next wave of commerce - Commerce-as-a-Service: 
Businesses need enterprise class eCommerce--without the enterprise challenges. Rather than make the commerce platform the center of business IT architecture, commercetools enables businesses to retain their existing infrastructure and connect through a versatile API. For companies seeking a competitive edge across all channels, commercetools provides the fastest development, easiest integration and lowest TCO. 
Key benefits include: -- Improve Speed to Market: By leveraging micro-service integrations businesses are not tied to specific platforms or third-party solutions so they can stay in control, regardless of marketplace channels, without being restrictive or wasting valuable deployment time. API first strategies significantly reduce the complexities faced by the development and marketing teams in building and maintaining innovative commerce applications that radically decreases development and operating costs all in the same step. -- Unleash Creativity: Decoupling the front and back end will give the power to marketing departments to work creatively with their front end, while a cloud-based platform satisfies the needs of the IT department for a secure, highly scalable and robust back end solution. 
Demonstrations will be available at booth #1068. For more information, visit commercetools at Shop.org Digital Summit 2015, schedule a meeting or download the whitepaper: "Fusion of Content & Commerce: Shopping Experiences for Modern Customers," at http://commercetools.us/etail/ . 
About commercetools 
commercetools, a cloud commerce software provider, delivers enterprise class commerce without the enterprise hassles. commercetools is reshaping the way creative B2C brands and B2B companies approach commerce by freeing up their focus for what's most important: Their business. For companies seeking a competitive edge across all channels, commercetools' Commerce-as-a-Service provides the fastest development, easiest integration and lowest TCO. commercetools gives CMOs and developers the freedom and creative flexibility they have wanted for years, without the high cost.
